channel.title: 500k potentiometer question
channel.description: If I use 10x 500k potentiometers instead of 10x 10k potentiometers, will it have any effect on the control range of parameters in Axoloti? ie will some of the values be "unreachable" if I change the resistance of the pots by such a large amount?

item.title: 500k potentiometer question
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebastian Cordoves
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

Also take in account that with high value pots the current flowing into Axoloti will be very low and you may have problems with noise and erratic readings...

Read full topic

item.title: 500k potentiometer question
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

The input impedance on the analog inputs is fairly low, (under 50k ohms), so I'd expect using pots with a high value will probably affect the linearity of the measurments, but not the range.

I'd try it, and see what happens.

Read full topic
